channel.title: How To Download YouTube videos Tut
channel.description:
First Go to [url=http://www.youtube.com]www.youtube.com[/url] then load up the video you want and copy the url [img]http://img35.picoodle.com/img/img35/8/6/18/f_Picture2m_03c6551.jpg[/img]
then Go to [url=http://www.keepvid.com]www.keepvid.com[/url] and put the url on the search box and click sumbit [img]http://img39.picoodle.com/img/img39/8/6/18/f_Picture1m_73a6acc.jpg[/img]
Then Click the Download Link [img]http://img30.picoodle.com/img/img30/8/6/18/f_Picture3m_d9d3f4d.jpg[/img]
when download is finished you need to add a extension file name by renaming it(shortcut key= Windows=F12/Mac=Enter example. from getvid to getvid.flv from Example to Example.flv
if you dont have a flv player download it here [url=http://applian.com/flvplayer/?src=KeepvidPlay]http://applian.com/flvplayer/?src=KeepvidPlay[/url]

item.title: How To Download YouTube videos Tut
item.dc:creator: @nicatron nicatron
item.description:
@nicatron wrote:

[quote=“VB7 Rocks, post:3, topic:112829”]Couldn’t you just use the video downloader add-on for Firefox?

https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/3590

It’s much faster to do, in my opinion.

I guess your way works if you’re using a browser like Safari or IE though.

Edit: Sorry, link was to wrong addon hehe[/quote]
much better than this tut. It automaticly does that stuff for you.
becareful which vids you get…

Read full topic

item.title: How To Download YouTube videos Tut
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“kingdude(kingstun), post:5, topic:112829”]Yes
There are 2 ways that I know

First Way:
When your about download change the .flv to .avi
Note:This way is not comfirmed

Second Way:
Find a converter[/quote]

How does changing the extension from .flv to .avi convert it? The .avi is still the compressed .flv file just with a new extension. Windows media player (or any avi player) won’t open the .avi because it’s a .flv file inside it.

Method 1 doesn’t work.

Read full topic
